title: My Season Rewards?
body:
So i was suspended for 14 days at 4th of august that should make me eligible for rewards according to riots webpage at 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon 
since i havent been issued a ban after 7th of august and i havent received any other sort of restriction in that time.
can someone help ?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: I believe that season rewards would not be provided it he account was still suspended during the the time frame, not just when it was applied.  Feel free to his us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our player behavior team can look into your specific issue individually and offer more context.  Good luck!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/K5Vtw6EG-ranked-rewards-the-unabridged-version-all-rewards-distributed in this link  dArtagnan explains that:
Things that will get your ass disqualified from Ranked Rewards
Currently banned or having active chat/ranked restrictions at November 8th, 00:01
_**If you got a 7 day (or more) ban issued on August 7th 00:01 or after, you will be ineligible to receive rewards.**_
Players banned for boosting or who were boosted during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards
Players who received fraud-related (including Chargeback bans) and accidental/false bans will still be eligible
Players who had LeaverBuster suspensions are still eligible
Being ineligible for 2016 Ranked Rewards does not automatically disqualify you from getting other rewards in future seasons
ps im sorry i couldnt quote it,im not that experienced in how the boards work.

proof that my account was banned for 14 days at 4th of august 
http://ust.chatango.com/um/x/p/xpanos97/img/l_205.jpg
